name: _id
description: A unique identifier (opaque). Round number is kept in the `round` field.

name: blockWasProposed
description: Whether a block was proposed and executed in this round.

name: epoch
description: The epoch the round belongs to.

name: shardId
description: The shard ID of the round entry. Each round will ideally produce 4 entries in this index.

name: signersIndexes
description: An array that contains the indices of the validators that should sign the block from this round.
